author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

Moving from Tracking Reco Geometry to Digi Geometry. As it is the `TrackerGeometry` object isn't found in the `TrackerRecoGeometryRecord`.

Discussion [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30817#discussion_r456797671)

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos

Should not affect any of the current workflows
title: Moving to Digi Geometry for L1 Hitless Seeding
